entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of rain mixed with snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
